posts.post_content:
Regarding the affinity deck, there was really only two choices: Ban the deck or create some even more overpowered artifact hosing. I'm glad they went with the first option, as the latter would've probably destroyed any chance of artifacts ever being played again.  
  
Imi Statue may have failed its original purpose, but it still does a pretty decent job at hosing non-affinity artifact decks such as Modular, Esper and other creature based strategies. It also has some pretty sweet art and a very intriguing flavor text.
posts.html:

Imi Statue may have failed its original purpose, but it still does a pretty decent job at hosing non-affinity artifact decks such as Modular, Esper and other creature based strategies. It also has some pretty sweet art and a very intriguing flavor text.
